basics.name: Peter Gibbons
basics.summary: Just a straight-shooter, with upper management written all over him.
highlights: I once did nothing for an entire day.
It was everything I thought it could be.

work.summary: Magazine Clearinghouse is the nation's leader in door-to-door magazine sales.  Provides opportunities to people who used to be addicted to crack, etc.
highlights: Sold up to 30 magazine subscriptions in a single day.
Make more money than I ever did working for Initech.

work.summary: Initech is an innovative financial services firm, and TPS Report processor.  However, we also know how to relax and have fun, such as with our Hawaiian Shirt Fridays program.
highlights: Outstanding multitasker, I dealt with seven different bosses simultaneously.  Seven, Bob.
Promoted to management, I had s many as four people working right underneath me.
Responsible for identifying Y2K-related issues in application code.
Diagnosed 'PC Load Letter' issues.  I actually do know what that means.

additionalWork.summary: Paying my way through school with an exciting opportunity in the fast-food service industry.

publications.name: Money Laundering for Dummies
publications.summary: Similar to the plot from "Superman III"

additionalPublications.name: Washington High School Class of 1993 Yearbook
additionalPublications.summary: Served as understudy to the assistant editor for my high school yearbook.
